Title: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for goods sold at fundraisers organized by school-based volunteer organizations
Summary: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for goods sold at fundraisers organized by school-based volunteer organizations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting a sales and compensating use tax exemption for goods sold at fundraisers organized by school-based volunteer organizations
